benchmark_details.name: CogBench
benchmark_details.overview: CogBench is a new benchmark specifically designed for the Multimodal Retrieval Augmented Generation Planning (MRAG Planning) task, facilitating the integration of lightweight CogPlanner with resource-efficient multimodal language models (MLLMs).

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the decision-making capabilities related to Multimodal Retrieval Augmented Generation Planning and to evaluate the performance of MLLMs in real-world multimodal querying scenarios.

data.source: Generated from web-sourced screenshots and manual user interaction simulations.
data.annotation: Human-annotated based on the decision-making process of MRAG Planning.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated by measuring token overlap and precision/recall of claims against ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: A higher F1 Score indicates a better performance of the MRAG Planning system.
methodology.baseline_results: CogPlanner demonstrated significant improvements over existing MRAG approaches, achieving more than 15% gains.
methodology.validation: The benchmark has been thoroughly tested against various models to validate its effectiveness.
